instructions.name: rotate right
instructions.shortDescription: <reg> = rotate A right by one bit

instructions.name: rotate right by n bits
mappedInstructions: executes "ror A" (<n>-1) times and then "ror <reg>" once

instructions.name: rotate left
instructions.shortDescription: <reg> = rotate A left by one bit

instructions.name: rotate left by n bits
mappedInstructions: executes "rol A" (<n>-1) times and then "rol <reg>" once

instructions.name: output to 7-segment display
instructions.shortDescription: Outputs the value in the given register to the 7-segment display

instructions.name: output immediate to 7-segment display
instructions.shortDescription: Outputs the value in the given register to the 7-segment display

instructions.name: output to lcd as control
instructions.shortDescription: Outputs the value in the given register to the LCD-display as control

instructions.name: output immediate to lcd as control
instructions.shortDescription: Outputs the immediate value to the LCD-display as control

instructions.name: output to lcd as data
instructions.shortDescription: Outputs the value in the given register to the LCD-display as data

instructions.name: output immediate to lcd as data
instructions.shortDescription: Outputs the immediate value to the LCD-display as data

instructions.name: halt
instructions.shortDescription: Halts the entire computer. This instruction is called at the end of a program.

instructions.name: call
instructions.shortDescription: Calls the function placed at the given address

instructions.name: branch if not equal to immediate
branch if less than immediate unsigned
branch if less or equal immediate
branch if less or equal unsigned
branch if less or equal immediate unsigned
branch if greater or equal immediate
branch if greater or equal unsigned
branch if greater or equal immediate unsigned
branch if greater than immediate unsigned
branch if zero set
instructions.shortDescription: branch if branch if ZF is set

instructions.name: branch if zero clear
instructions.shortDescription: branch if ZF is not set

instructions.name: branch if carry clear
instructions.shortDescription: branch if CF is not set

instructions.name: branch if negative clear
instructions.shortDescription: branch if NF is not set

instructions.name: branch if overflow clear
instructions.shortDescription: branch if VF is not set
